definitions.definition: An automobile that is larger than a compact but smaller than a full-sized car .
Any substance formed as part of a series of chemical reactions that is not the end - product .

subdefinitions.definition: Any such substance that is produced and sold to commercial customers ( business-to-business sales) as an input to other chemical processes.

definitions.definition: A kind of tyre with relatively light grooving, used for conditions between fully dry and fully wet.
examples: Light rain was coming so he chose intermediate tyres.

secondary_definitions: An automobile that is larger than a compact but smaller than a full-sized car .
( chemistry ) Any substance formed as part of a series of chemical reactions that is not the end - product .
( motor racing ) A kind of tyre with relatively light grooving, used for conditions between fully dry and fully wet.
